title: So Smooth, Want to Fiddle
detail_text: <:th_ch0106/>Kanata-. Hey Kanata-? Where are you-.... Ah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Zzz….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>How can you even sleep here, geez…. Wake up. We have a dance lesson on the beach coming up<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Nnyaah~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I said wake up! Gosh…. Eh? Kanata’s hair is so smooth…. And so soft…. Eeeh-? Hairs like this exist….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hnggh….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Wa…. That scared me. I thought she woke up…. It must be so nice to have hair this smooth…. I want to try styling it….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Sure~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Kyaah!!!! W- w- what!? I- if you’re awake, then let’s go! We have a dance lesson, so!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Eeh~, it felt good to have Yoshiko-chan touch Kanata’s hair, so Kanata wanted to enjoy it some more~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>S-, s- s-, since when were you up?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Since you came here~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
